comment: Rhubarb is one of Kennesaw's greatest assets. He sets you up to succeed in the course. Honestly, if you get less than an A in this class you're doing it wrong. He goes over the test the day prior to the tests and gives the answers. DO NOT buy the textbook for this class!! Save yourself $100. Everything you need he gives you.

He's the BEST teacher at KSU! He brings pizza and full candy bars on test days. He gives you the study guide and answers the day before the test. He got me an internship on a radio show! He's WONDERFUL! Take him!!!!

He's KSU's BEST teacher! He cares so much for his students and his class is really engaging. He's not hard at all, either. He's AWESOME. TAKE HIM TAKE HIM TAKE HIM. He also helps you find internships!
His classes are so hard to get into because he's so amazing. i too wish he taught more classes. you must do work, show interest, and show up, and he will prove it was worth it. love this man!

Rhubarb genuinely cares about each individual student. I wish he taught more than just two courses here at KSU because his real-world experience and knowledge is remarkable. He let me retake a test three times because he genuinely wants his students to do well. Favorite professor of my college career.

He's a great guy at heart.  He talks about HIMSELF A LOT but if you can get pass that and all of the name dropping you'll be okay. He repeats the same stories over and over...and over again but it's not too painful. Don't be late for class he WILL call you out (no one is exempt). Don't buy the textbook you won't use it.  Easy A!!

Amazing! Reviews test questions the class before and truly wants his students to do well. He is truly an amazing professor that knows his stuff. Very strict about attendance, but if you show up you will get an A! Must take!

I was happily surprised that the class was so easy. Reviews possible test questions the class before the test. Brings food sometimes. Strict on attendance and being on time. Very comical. Likes to brag about the famous people he's met from his radio days and he's very opinionated, but I would still take him again. Fun class!

Mr. Jones is one of the best Professors at Kennesaw State. His real world experience is invaluable, he brings his classes to life through disscussions and his ability to read people. Mr. Jones knows how to reach students in a way that most teachers could only dream of...he truly believes in his students. Must-take!

Pro. Jones is a great Professor. He is a bit unorthodox but it makes for a breath of fresh air. He is the opposite of stuff and will work with you  if you show up and do as he asks. He is a must take professor at Kennesaw State.

Ok, I LOVE Rhubarb as a person. He's very sweet & funny. But he's just teaching so he has a soapbox to stand on. He requires attendance but shouldn't bc all he does is tell jokes & give opinions. No real teaching. DONT BUY THE BOOK. Show up, get an A. The class is sort of insulting to ppl who want to actually learn, though.

Rhubarb has real world experience, yes.  He's a nice guy, yes.  But he doesn't apply his experience effectively.  With that said, don't buy the book, he doesn't use it. Show up on time and speak your mind in a respectful manner.  You will glide with an A.  However, don't expect to learn a lot from him.  He really isn't a great "teacher".

I had Rhubarb for both Contemp Issues and Media Mgmt. INCREDIBLY easy, and a very nice guy. But attendance is 40% of your grade, so don't lose out on an A because of skipping class. Three tests, three short, easy opinion papers, and that's it. Having a tough semester? Supplement it with an easy course w/no stress - take Rhubarb :-p

Mr. Jones is a "real world" guy with "real world" experience that is invaluable to all his students.  He absolutely rocks!  One of the best professors ever.  Tests are not hard, but you learn so much from him... definitely substance over form.
wonderful professor! interesting lectures, kind, and understands his students!! attendance is mandatory, but you want to go to class!
ok- if you show up to class he will not fail you. has very cool past but first time professor. easy exams, sometimes boring lectures.

Phenomenal teacher. Very easy class. Rhubarb was enthusiastic and entertaining. He has lots of good stories and info after spending years in the communication industry. However if you want an A you MUST participate in class discussion. Highly recommended.
Love Rhubarb! I'm taking all his classes. He's open and straight forward. His papers and tests are easy and class sessions are entertaining :) Recommended to all.
Finally!  After so many classes a professor who GETS us!  Who talks to us....not AT us!  This one should be teaching many more students, many more class, but I don't want to share!
